## Meeting.updateMedia() method

A confluence of updateAudio, updateVideo, and updateShare this function re-establishes all of the media streams with new options

**Signature:**

```typescript
updateMedia(options?: {
        localStream?: MediaStream;
        localShare?: MediaStream;
        mediaSettings?: any;
    }): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | { localStream?: MediaStream; localShare?: MediaStream; mediaSettings?: any; } | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

any
